alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 4:49AM PST until February 26 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. Locally up to 3 feet in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...Through 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible on Highways 95, 266 and 264. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Watch for downed trees and powerlines as well.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
